overview: In a domain where it isn’t safe anymore. Shrewd government security forces only watch as society  rips itself apart. A killer space alien flips the coin.  Gripping, military, comic book, sci-fi gore horror thriller.  Year 2022.  A DoD satellite earths view, radio chatter.  Night-time -  “Caracas, Venezuela. The murder capital of the world.”  During the sweltering tropical heat of an uncomfortable summer’s night, a relentless electrical storm  crunches throughout the sky.
title: The Predator Rebooted
